bodydiv.p: If an entity prepares a sensitivity analysis that shows how amounts different from those specified in paragraph 128(a) are affected by changes in risk variables and uses that sensitivity analysis to manage risks arising from contracts within the scope of IFRS 17, it may use that sensitivity analysis in place of the analysis specified in paragraph 128(a). The entity shall also disclose:

li.p: an explanation of the method used in preparing such a sensitivity analysis and of the main parameters and assumptions underlying the information provided; and
an explanation of the objective of the method used and of any limitations that may result in the information provided.
